# Delhi Public School, Warangal

| coordinates =

Delhi Public School, Warangal (commonly known as DPS Warangal) is a day and residential CBSE school with more than 2000 students. The school started functioning on 19 June 2014. It is operated under the aegis of Delhi Public School Society, New Delhi.
Awards and recognition
The school was recognised as the best school in Warangal, Telangana by Education World 2022-23 ranking.
